title: 6.23 lag
body: Game has been loading up oddly. Disconnect upon load up. Reconnect doesn't work. Have to shut down client and reopen just to get it to reload slower than it did in 6.22.

replies.body: What do you mean by disconnect at load up?  Is this only happening after champion select when the game is loading?  What do you see exactly, and are there any error messages?  Let me know.
Yeah.Now i can't launch the lol client too...
